title: Preecha Nopparat
text: Preecha Nopparat (born 21 September 1948) is a Thai <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201972%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Featherweight">men's featherweight</a> event at the <a href="1972%20Summer%20Olympics">1972 Summer Olympics</a>. At the 1972 Summer Olympics, he lost to <a href="Andras%20Botos">Andras Botos</a> of Hungary in the Round of 64.
